editionStmt.p: The initial version of this file was created from data kindly provided by the Ethiopic Manuscript Imaging Project directed by Steve Delamarter.

publicationStmt.publisher: Die Schriftkultur des christlichen Äthiopiens und Eritreas: Eine multimediale Forschungsumgebung / Beta maṣāḥǝft

licence.p: This file is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0.

msContents.summary: Psalter, ዳዊት፡. Opening prayer is from the Psalter of the Virgin. : Marks the midpoint of the Psalms with a marginal symbol. Contains the short version of Pslam 151. Canticle 4 is Prayer of Hana, Mother of Samuel, prophet. Song of Songs is the common version. Praises of Mary begin on Monday. , Crude drawing of David playing the harp. : crude drawing of Madonna and Child. : crude drawings of faces. : crude drawing of angel with sword drawn from scabbard. 1v note of ownership: This psalter belongs to Memher ቀጸላ አላምነህ . F-1v (written upside down): Prayer for members of a family by the owner of the book, ቀጻላ ጊዮርጊስ. Arranged for the Days of the week: Monday (3r), Tuesday (22v), Wednesday (42r), etc. , top margin: note of ownership: This psalter belongs to Lij ቀጸላ. v: Colophon: beginning with a condemnation on anyone who steals or erases anything in the book. The book was written by ተክለ ጊዮርጊስ፥ in 1917 EC, Tahsas 1. : pen trials.
